column6:
It's the return of Peter Parker's old flame, Deb Whitman! Unfortunately for Peter, she's written a tell-all memoir about her relationship with him, entitled "How Spider-Man Ruined My Life." Ouch! As if that weren't bad enough, the Vulture has been set loose from prison to scavenge for Spider-Man, but who's behind his release and what nefarious scheme do they have up their sleeve? ,2006,11
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | penciller (cover):Scot Eaton | inker:Andrew Hennessy | colorist:Paul Mounts | letterer:Cory Petit
